definitions.title: n.pr.loc.
definitions.body: Ezr 2:27 = Ne 7:31; = [[מִכְמָשׂ]] (v. Baer's notes) 1Sa 13:2 + 6 t. 1 S, + 2 t.;—city in Benjamin, N. fr. Geba and Jerusalem 1Sa 13:2, 1Sa 13:5 (E. fr. Bethaven), v:1Sa 13:11, v:1Sa 13:16, v:1Sa 13:23, 1Sa 14:5, 1Sa 14:31, Is 10:28, Ne 11:31; ´[[אַנְשֵׁי מּ]] Ezr 2:27 = Ne 7:31. LXX Max(e)mav, etc. (On Mikmās v. Rob:BR i. 440 ff. Buhl:Geogr. § 96.)
